summary: Arcade Fire is a popular Canadian rock band from Montreal. The main members are Win Butler, RÃ©gine Chassagne, Richard Reed Parry, Tim Kingsbury, and Jeremy Gara. They started in 2001 and gained fame with their first album, *Funeral*, in 2004. Since then, they've won many awards and been very successful. Their albums *Neon Bible*, *The Suburbs*, *Reflektor*, *Everything Now*, and *We* have all been well-received. The band is known for using many different instruments and often switches roles during live performances.
title: Arcade Fire
